data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Xaisômboun, Laos to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Xaisômboun, Laos
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 2,160 believers in Xaisômboun, Laos how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,160 believers in Xaisômboun to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 2,160 believers in Xaisômboun and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Chepya people. Make the Chepya people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Xaisômboun, Laos today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Xaisômboun to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Xaisômboun, Laos and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: Xaisômboun
location.people_groups_list: Katang, Southern, Deaf, Giay, Kuan, Khuen, Alak
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Katang, Southern (42,000), Deaf (73,000), Giay (7,300), Kuan, Khuen (13,000), Alak (26,000)
